alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Orange; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 6:13PM EDT until June 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Orange County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 612 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carrboro, or 7 miles south of Chapel Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Hillsborough, Carrboro, Rougemont, RDU International, Morrisville and Lake Michie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
